cert_alt_names.name: cert_alt_names
cert_alt_names.description: Optional, Alternate names for the certificate to be created

cert_common_name.name: cert_common_name
cert_common_name.description: Fully qualified domain name or host domain name for the certificate to be created

cert_csr.name: cert_csr
cert_csr.description: Certificate signing request. If you don't include this parameter, the CSR that is used to generate the certificate is created internally

cert_custom_metadata.name: cert_custom_metadata
cert_custom_metadata.description: Optional, Custom metadata for the certificate to be created

cert_description.name: cert_description
cert_description.description: Optional, Extended description of certificate to be created. To protect privacy, do not use personal data, such as name or location, as a description for certificate

cert_ip_sans.name: cert_ip_sans
cert_ip_sans.description: Optional, IP Subject Alternative Names (SANs) to define for the CA certificate, in a comma-delimited list

cert_labels.name: cert_labels
cert_labels.description: Optional, Labels for the certificate to be created

cert_name.name: cert_name
cert_name.description: Name of the certificate to be created in Secrets Manager

cert_other_sans.name: cert_other_sans
cert_other_sans.description: Optional, The custom Object Identifier (OID) or UTF8-string Subject Alternative Names (SANs) to define for the CA certificate. The alternative names must match the values that are specified in the 'allowed_other_sans' field in the associated certificate template

cert_rotation.name: cert_rotation
cert_rotation.description: Optional, Rotation policy for the certificate to be created

cert_secrets_group_id.name: cert_secrets_group_id
cert_secrets_group_id.description: Optional, Id of Secrets Manager secret group to store the certificate in

cert_template.name: cert_template
cert_template.description: Name of the certificate template to use

cert_ttl.name: cert_ttl
cert_ttl.description: Optional, Time-to-live (TTL) to assign to a private certificate

cert_uri_sans.name: cert_uri_sans
cert_uri_sans.description: Optional, URI Subject Alternative Names (SANs) to define for the CA certificate, in a comma-delimited list

cert_version_custom_metadata.name: cert_version_custom_metadata
cert_version_custom_metadata.description: Optional, Custom version metadata for the certificate to be created

exclude_cn_from_sans.name: exclude_cn_from_sans
exclude_cn_from_sans.description: Optional, Controls whether the common name is excluded from Subject Alternative Names (SANs). If set to true, the common name is not included in DNS or Email SANs if they apply

private_key_format.name: private_key_format
private_key_format.description: Optional, Format of the generated private key

return_format.name: return_format
return_format.description: Optional, Format of the returned data

secrets_manager_region.name: secrets_manager_region
secrets_manager_region.description: Region the Secrets Manager instance is in

service_endpoints.name: service_endpoints
service_endpoints.description: Service endpoint type to communicate with the provided secrets manager instance. Possible values are `public` or `private`

secret_crn.name: secret_crn
secret_crn.description: Private certificates secrets manager secret CRN

secret_id.name: secret_id
secret_id.description: Private certificates secrets manager secret ID
